original_text: Their houses are full of valuable things, like a trap that is full of beautiful birds. They have cheated people and they have robbed them. That is how they have become rich and powerful. Their houses are full of valuable things,
korean_text: 새장에 새들이 가득함 같이 너희 집들에 속임이 가득하도다 그러므로 너희가 번창하고 거부가 되어

sentences.original_text: Their houses are full of valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 집은 귀한 것들로 가득 차 있습니다

sentences.original_text: like a trap that is full of beautiful birds
That is how they have become rich
Their houses are full of valuable things
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 집은 귀한 것들로 가득 차 있습니다
